txt.en:
'[placeholder], something troubles me....

'I worry that our efforts here might push more of the Corsairs into the vale in the north. We cannot allow them to move freely into Blackroot Vale... there are still many who dwell there and they are ill-prepared for combat.

'I know of a hunter in Sardol named Melril. She is a hale hunter, and would be the first to stand against our foes in Tarlang's Crown. Seek her out, and aid in reinforcing our defences to the north!'
Talk to Melril in northern Tarlang's Crown
Harnion of Dol Amroth grows concerned that the forces in Tarlang's Crown will assault Blackroot Vale before moving on to the rest of Gondor.

'Ah, [placeholder]! It is an honour to meet you.\n\n'I have heard much of your efforts in Blackroot Vale, and I am glad you have returned once more to aid us. Our situation grows more dire by the moment, so if you seek to help us, we could rest easier knowing the Enemy is being kept at bay.'

Melril can be found along the path leading through Tarlang's Crown, to the south-west of Sardol in Blackroot Vale.\n\nHarnion has asked you to seek Melril in northern Tarlang's Crown and aid the people of Blackroot Vale.
